docs.snippet: Alex Rodriguez was in the Yankees’ lineup on Monday night, and with an appeal almost certain, he could remain there for the rest of the season....
docs.lead_paragraph: Alex Rodriguez was in the Yankees’ lineup on Monday night, and with an appeal almost certain, he could remain there for the rest of the season.
docs.abstract: New York Yankees third baseman Alex Rodriguez returns to the lineup amid a backdrop of boos by fans who recently learned of his 211-game suspension; Rodriguez has decided to appeal in process that may allow him to play right through the end of the 2013 MLB season.

headline.main: A Return to the Lineup and a Fight to Stay
headline.print_headline: For Rodriguez, Suspended Animation: A Return to the Lineup and a Fight to Stay
